title: Llanrwst
name: Bys a Bawd
directions: About 200 meters on A548 (road to Denbigh and Abergele) from Llanrwst town square, on left hand side
content: Siop Lyfrau Cymreg. Llyfrau Cymraeg a Saesneg am Gymru. Cardiau ac anrhegion. Welsh Book Shop. Welsh language and Welsh interest books. Greeting Cards and gifts.
